item.title: Automating AWS Well-Architected Framework validations with Dynatrace CloudFormation templates
item.description:
Dynatrace is proud to be the first AWS global tech partner to offer ready-to-use CloudFormation templates for validating the Well-Architected pillars. The Dynatrace CloudFormation templates are now available in the AWS CloudFormation Public Extensions Registry, which makes Well-Architected validation even more accessible for AWS users.

Dynatrace and the AWS Well-Architected Framework ensure continuous optimization of cloud architecture, aligning with the key pillars of operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, cost optimization, and sustainability. Our previous blog post discussed the importance of integrating Dynatrace with the AWS Well-Architected Framework to enhance your software development lifecycle (SDLC). By leveraging Dynatrace Workflow Automation and the Site Reliability Guardian, organizations can ensure that their applications meet AWSâ€™s best practices across all pillars.
